posts.post_title: Looking to buy Lowgrade Common N284 Buchner Gold Coins
posts.post_content:
Willing to buy individually or groups (preferably groups!!)  Looking for common players to start and hoping to stick around the lowgrade levels.  Beaters, trimmed cards, skinned cards, etc... are welcome!

Thanks in advance!

Brian
